about_the_game:
This fantasy adventure game follows the story of a girl who's lost her limbs and works with a devil to get her revenge. Lead Noel, the devil Caron, and a variety of characters on action-packed missions as you progress through the story.

After many battles, Noel and Caron have gained new allies: Oscar and Fugo, her former enemies, as well as Toad, Python and Slug, members of Fugo's gang. Together, they continue their quest for revenge on Mayor Burrows.

In Season 10, the group's pursuit of Lhaplus's dark secret brings them to a luxury cruise ship threatened by a time bomb. The explosive is part of a deadly game they've joined. To win, they must discover which of the 52 playing-card-style keycards will disarm the bomb.

Explore the ship, buy, sell, and trade cards to other players, get hints from the ship's entertainment, and obtain the right card!

Will you be able to keep the ship above water and the people onboard breathing?

Season 10 Story

It's only been a few days since the battle in Meroi, but Noel and her friends can't afford to rest on their laurels. They return to the tunnels underneath Aquarius Shipping to search for the Lhaplus Trench and plan their next move. Perhaps the last thing they expect to find is a message from Madame Coffin, former manager of Russell Burrows' casino.

Coffin invites Noel to play one last game, with higher stakes than ever. If she wins, she'll learn Lhaplus's secret. If she loses, her life is forfeit.

With no better option, Noel accepts the challenge. But even she isn't prepared for the life-or-death struggle that awaits her on board Coffin's personal cruise ship...
